Description: Sherd of tall ring foot and floor of Attic pottery stemless cup or cup-skyphos. Interior glazed save for small tondo, offset by triple rings; in tondo, painted decoration consisting of part of small ithyphallic mule or donkey in silhouette style; exterior glazed black; added red band on prominent moulding at join with foot; two broad bands on outside and inside of foot; underside of floor glazed; inscription on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 525)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.0673) (Phase 1)
